Summary: near a airport many small balls of different colored lights flashing in a cluster, and some white stand stills.
trends: There have been no other sightings in SANFORD
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsWorking for ups, out delevering packages. I saw in a distance a cluser of bright lights flashing in different colors in a cluster. It was around 8:30 or so p.m. Then it was on the local news a few days later. A close up shot you can see the detail that is wasn't from here. It looked like a disco ball. And it was still. And no noice. Then I went back to work looking at for about a minute.?
